Subject: Image & Videos is not able to upload in AWS Drive Like S3 and all
Description:
Hi Team,

We are facing the issue while upload the image & video mp4 files in AWS S3 BUCKET and all that is not working and we have already add in allow list. all the whitelist domain could you please check and resolve the issue asap.
What_We_Know__c: The users uploads of files were blocked to the AWS S3 domain due to a CAP policy which is configured to block the transfers of file types.  The issue was that the AWS S3 domain was not added correctly to the DPI URL / domain allowed list.  After we added the correct format of domain the issue was solved.
Next_Steps__c: The issue was resolved on call, case can be closed.
Solution_Comment__c:
Hi Sanjay,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  We were able to resolve the issue by adding the Amazon aws S3 domain to the DPI domain / URL allowed list, after adding the domain the user tested to see if their uploads were allowed and confirmed that it was working.  As agreed on our call this case will be closed. 

After a ticket has been closed it can be reopened within 30 days after closure in case there are any updates from your side. If no update is received within 30 days after closure then a new ticket will need to be opened where you can use the previous ticket number as a reference.
